pullRequest.title: Encode the ballerina generated names for jvm
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Fixes #26346
Approach
Currently the generated names that contain special chars like . \ : are blindly replaced by _ at code generation. This can cause name clashes. This PR uses the encoding scheme to uniquely encode them.
Eg. :     a\b.foo:0.1.0.<init>  ->  a$0047b$0046foo$00580$00461$00460$0046$0060init$0062
The fix concerns three possible clashes that can occur.

support generated function names
support package names
support immutable type names

Samples
Remarks
Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

nodes.bodyText: shall we make the value $0046 a constant as it is used in multiple locations.
can we change the since value?

Modify package visibility of IdentifierUtils for tooling
